txt.en: The many predators of Mirkwood are as black as the night itself, corrupted by the long years of evil.
Defeat many beasts in Southern Mirkwood
Many dark beasts terrorize the dense forest of Southern Mirkwood.
Many dark beasts terrorize the dense forest of Southern Mirkwood.

Mirkwood may never recover from the presence of the Necromancer, and it will never be wholly cleansed of the evil that was present for so long, but the corrupted beasts of this forest will know better than to stand in your way.
